.. _projectconf_upload_resetmethod:

``upload_resetmethod``
----------------------

Type: ``String`` | Multiple: ``No``

Specify reset method for "uploader" tool. This option isn't available for all
development platforms. The only :ref:`platform_espressif8266` supports it.
